p: In one study, 1391 children with a median age of 6.7Â years were surveyed, and 171 were diagnosed with COVID-19. Intensive Care Unit (ICU) and mechanical ventilation were needed for only three children, who had underlying conditions. By March 8th, 2020, one child with intussusception had died, 21 children remained in a stable condition in the ward, and 149 cases were discharged [25].
